name: Class Point2D.Float
text:
The Float class defines a point specified in float
 precision.
codes:
public static class Point2D.Float
extends Point2D
implements Serializable

fields.description: The X coordinate of this Point2D.
The Y coordinate of this Point2D.

methods.description:
Returns the X coordinate of this Point2D in
 double precision.

Returns the Y coordinate of this Point2D in
 double precision.

methods.method_sig:
public void setLocation (double x,
                        double y)
methods.description:
Sets the location of this Point2D to the
 specified double coordinates.

methods.method_sig:
public void setLocation (float x,
                        float y)
methods.description:
Sets the location of this Point2D to the
 specified float coordinates.

Returns a String that represents the value
 of this Point2D.
